title: Build Tensorflow on RHEL 7 with or without GPU (CUDA) support
body_html:
Was searching high and wide for a guide that included all the steps to install TF on Rhel. Posting the solution that worked for me. Also includes CUDA install steps.

Machine Specs:
GCP Rhel 7 OS
Tested P-100 and V-100 GPU
Tensorflow 1.10.0
CUDA 9.2
cuDNN 7.2
